languages.text: "Вот как? Возможно, техноматы были неосторожны при обслуживании. Или же варп играет шутки с нами, невзирая на Поле Геллера. Или же истории про одержимый корабль все же имеют под собой основание". {n}Теодора беспечно смеется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вот как? Я держу на палубе нескольких питомцев с одной из моих планет. Возможно, кто-то был неосторожен во время кормления. Или же варп играет шутки с нами, невзирая на Поле Геллера. Или же наш одержимый корабль решил поразвлечься". {n}Теодора беспечно смеется.{/n}

languages.text: "Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вот как? Возможно, техноматы были неосторожны при обслуживании. Или же варп играет шутки с нами, невзирая на Поле Геллера. Или же истории про одержимый корабль все же имеют под собой основание". {n}Теодора беспечно смеется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

"Is that so? I do keep a number of pets native to one of my planets on the officers' deck. Perhaps someone was careless during feeding time. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller Field. Or perhaps our possessed ship was in mood for a lark." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

"Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller Field. Or perhaps our possessed ship was in the mood for a lark." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

"Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps our possessed ship was in the mood for a lark." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

"Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

languages.text: “是这样吗？可能是那些技工的维护工作太敷衍了，可能是亚空间的力量穿透了盖勒力场，在和我们恶作剧。船员们都说我们的飞船闹鬼了，说不定他们说得没错。”{n}西奥多拉不以为意地大笑起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是这样吗？我确实在军官甲板上豢养了一群来自麾下各个行星的宠物。或许是有人喂食它们的时候不太小心，也可能是因为亚空间的力量穿透了盖勒力场，在和我们恶作剧。又或许是我们的飞船闹鬼了，打算到处乱飞一通。”{n}西奥多拉不以为意地大笑起来。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Ah, sí? Tal vez los tecnómatas hayan cometido algún error durante el mantenimiento. O tal vez la disformidad nos haya jugado una mala pasada a pesar del campo Geller. O, posiblemente, los rumores de que la nave está poseída sean más ciertos de lo que pensaba». {n}Theodora ríe con indiferencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Ah, sí? Tengo una serie de mascotas oriundas de uno de mis planetas en la cubierta de oficiales. Es posible que alguien se haya descuidado al darles de comer. O tal vez la disformidad nos haya jugado una mala pasada a pesar del campo Geller. O, posiblemente, la nave esté poseída y quisiera gastarnos una broma». {n}Theodora ríe con indiferencia.{/n}

languages.text: 「そう？もしかしたら、テクノマットのメンテ不足だったかもしれない。あるいは、ゲラーフィールドにもかかわらず、<歪み>が私たちに悪戯をしているのかもしれない。あるいは、船が何かに取り憑かれたというウワサの裏には、真実があるのかもしれない」{n}そう言って、シオドーラは、あっけらかんと笑う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうですか？私は士官デッキで私の惑星の一つに生息するペットを多数飼っています。もしかしたら誰かが餌やりの時に不注意だったかもしれません。あるいは、ゲラーフィールドにもかかわらず、<歪み>が私たちに悪戯をしているのかもしれません。あるいは、私たちの幽霊船がヒバリの気分だったのかもしれない」 {n}テオドラはあっけらかんと笑う。{/n}
「そう？もしかしたら、テクノマットのメンテ不足だったかもしれない。あるいは、ゲラーフィールドにもかかわらず、<歪み>が私たちに悪戯をしているのかもしれない。あるいは、船が何かに取り憑かれたというウワサの裏には、真実があるのかもしれない」{n}そう言って、シオドーラは、あっけらかんと笑う。{/n}

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Les technomates ont peut-être fait preuve de négligence lors des opérations de maintenance. À moins que le Warp ne nous joue des tours malgré la présence du champ de Geller. Ou peut-être que toutes ces histoires selon lesquelles le vaisseau serait possédé sont fondées, après tout. » {n}Théodora rit nonchalamment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Je garde un certain nombre d'animaux de compagnie originaires de l'une de mes planètes sur le pont des officiers. Quelqu'un a dû faire preuve de négligence au moment du repas. Ou alors, le Warp nous joue des tours malgré la présence du champ de Geller. Ou peut-être que notre vaisseau possédé était d'humeur à s'amuser. » {n}Théodora rit nonchalamment.{/n}

languages.text: "Tatsächlich? Vielleicht waren die Technomaten bei ihrer Wartung nachlässig. Oder der Warp hat uns trotz des Gellerfeldes einen Streich gespielt. Vielleicht sind aber auch all die Geschichten über die angebliche Besessenheit dieses Schiffes wahr." {n}Theodora lacht gleichgültig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich? Nun, ich halte einige Haustiere von einem meiner Planeten auf dem Offiziersdeck. Vielleicht war bei der Fütterung jemand unachtsam. Oder der Warp hat uns trotz des Gellerfelds einen Streich gespielt. Oder vielleicht hatte unser besessenes Schiff Lust auf einen Spaß." {n}Theodora lacht gleichgültig.{/n}

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Belki teknomatlar bakım sırasında dikkatsiz davranmışlardır ya da ne bileyim öteboyut, Geller alanına rağmen zihinlerimizle oyun oynamıştır. Belki de geminin perili olduğuna dair hikâyelerde hâkikat payı vardır." {n}Theodora kayıtsızca bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Perhaps the technomats were careless during maintenance. Or it could be the warp playing tricks on us in spite of the Geller field. Or perhaps there is something to all the stories about the ship being possessed after all." {n}Theodora laughs nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? Belki teknomatlar bakım sırasında dikkatsiz davranmışlardır ya da ne bileyim öteboyut, Geller alanına rağmen zihinlerimizle oyun oynamıştır. Belki de geminin perili olduğuna dair hikâyelerde hâkikat payı vardır." {n}Theodora kayıtsızca bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n}
